actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to include a definition of dietary supplements, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Dietary Supplement Amendment - Defines the term dietary supplement as any product in tablet, capsule, wafer, or other similar uniform unit, or in powder, granular, flake, or liquid form which contains vitamins and/or minerals or any other nutrients and which are represented for use by man to supplement his diet to increase the total dietary intake of the particular vitamins, minerals, or nutrients. Includes the term dietary supplement within various provisions of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act relating to food.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to include a definition of dietary supplements, and for other purposes.
